titleStmt.title: A reply to the Answer made upon the three royal papers
titleStmt.author: Dryden, John, 1631-1700.
Leyburn, John, 1620-1702.

notesStmt.note: The "papers" are by King Charles II and Anne, Duchess of York. Cf. The preface. The "Answer" is by E. Stillingfleet. Cf. BM.
Variously attributed to both John Dryden and John Leyburn. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
